lines.text: Stay away from ginger ale and tequila. It's a bitch!
Hey, you want to dance?
What I want, Winston, is I want OUT of here and I want out NOW!
Why? Don't you know how to dance?
I was supposed to have her home by midnight, and instead, I sold her to a pimp!
Did anything happen to you?
Well, let's see. I was kidnapped, they stole my dress and I was driven over here in the trunk of a car. Did you mean besides that?
Hey, give me a break here!

Gee, am I overreacting? Well, I guess being sold into prostitution has made me a little edgy; or maybe it's the thought of almost losing my virtue to the Goodyear blimp - and then again it could be simply the sleazy feeling of vinyl against my skin.
You know what you are? YOU are an egotistical, self-centered, little BRAT!
That's terrific!
[Bumps into guy on stairway]
Excuse me, sir. Now if you'll both pardon me, sir. Do you win over a lot of girls this way, Winston?
[Still can't get past the guy]
I'm sorry, sir, we'll be out of your way in just one moment.
Danger? Oh, danger! Well, I shudder to think what the vice president of the astronomy club would call DANGER - what did you do, jaywalk or something?
Nice hairdo... you get FM on that?
You took Tara into a SEWER?
Yeah, only for a couple of seconds.

[to rock band at club. Winston is wearing the sunglasses he found in the bathroom]
Excuse me, are you gonna talk or are you gonna rock?

[posturing, trying to look tough]
Yeah, I'm looking for this guy named Cueball. You know where he lives?

[spits on the sidewalk, in disdain]
Who wants to know?

[spits, weakly]
Tito.

[demeanor changes to cheerful compliance]
Oh, uh... ground floor, first door on the right.

[tries to untie Tara]
What have you got to wear?
All I've got is a tube-top and a mini-skirt.
It's *better* than nothing!
Winston, tube-tops are out, and the mini-skirt is vinyl.
